title: Public transport for P!NK -Summer Carnival Tour: Tuesday 12 March and Wednesday 13 March 2024
articleContent:
Public transport for P!NK -Summer Carnival Tour: Tuesday 12 March and Wednesday 13 March 2024

Three-time Grammy Award-winning singer, performer, and international pop icon P!NK is coming to Melbourne with her highly anticipated return to Australia on her ’Summer Carnival’ stadium tour at Marvel Stadium on Tuesday 12 March and Wednesday 13 March 2024. Extra services will help you get home from Marvel Stadium on both days.

Gates open at 5pm.

  • Jump to Tuesday 12 March 2024
  • Jump to Wednesday 13 March 2024
  • Jump to additional information

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

Tuesday 12 March 2024

 Metropolitan train

Trains depart Southern Cross after the event ends, as follows:

  • Mernda departing at 11:22pm & 11:41pm, Platform 9
  • Eltham departing at 11:28pm & 11:37pm Platform 9
  • Lilydale departing at 11:20pm & 11:30pm, Platform 10
  • Ringwood departing at 11:51pm, Platform 10
  • Glen Waverley departing at 11:15pm & 11:24pm, Platform 10
  • Pakenham departing at 11:15pm & 11:32pm, Platform 12
  • Frankston departing at 11:19pm & 11:40pm, Platform 13
  • Sandringham departing at 11:15pm & 11:45pm, Platform 13
  • Werribee departing at 11:23pm & 11:44pm, Platform 14
  • Watergardens departing at 11:28pm, 11:41pm & 11:55pm, Platform 14
  • Sunbury departing at 11:16pm & 11:41pm, Platform 14
  • Upfield departing at 11:19pm & 11:38pm, Platform 14

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Regional train

Normal timetable trains and consists will operate.

Forward service to Southern Cross Station

Additional services

  • Wyndham Vale (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving 3:05pm
  • Wyndham Vale (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving 3:30pm
  • Melton (Ballarat) to Southern Cross to leaving 4:20pm

Return service from Southern Cross Station

Additional services

  • Southern Cross to Wendouree (Ballarat) leaving 11:25pm
  • Southern Cross to Bacchus Marsh leaving 11:35pm
  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving 11:40pm
  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving 11:45pm

Special event coach service departs Southern Cross at 11.30pm, stopping as required to Seymour Station.

Additional capacity

  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving 11:30pm with additional seating
  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving 12:15am with additional seating
  • Southern Cross to Wendouree (Ballarat) leaving 11:52pm with additional seating
  • Southern Cross to Bendigo (Bendigo) leaving 11:57pm with additional seating

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from Marvel Stadium

Extra trams will operate as Route 30a & 86a between East Melbourne and Stop D1 Etihad Stadium via La Trobe Street.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan bus

Passengers can catch the following bus routes close to Marvel Stadium:

  • Route 232 (Altona North to City)
  • Route 235 (Fishermans Bend to City)
  • Route 302 (Box Hill to City)
  • Route 304 (Doncaster SC to City)
  • Route 905 (The Pines SC to City)
  • Route 906 (Warrandyte to City)
  • Route 907 (Mitcham to City)

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

Wednesday 13 March 2024

 Metropolitan train

Trains depart Southern Cross after the concert ends, as follows:

  • Mernda departing at 11:22pm & 11:41pm, Platform 9
  • Eltham departing at 11:28pm & 11:37pm, Platform 9
  • Ringwood departing at 11:18pm, 11:30pm 11:51pm, Platform 10
  • Glen Waverley departing at 11:15pm & 11:24pm, Platform 10
  • Pakenham departing at 11:15pm & 11:32pm, Platform 12
  • Frankston departing at 11:19pm & 11:40pm, Platform 13
  • Sandringham departing at 11:15pm & 11:45pm, Platform 13
  • Werribee departing at 11:23pm & 11:44pm, Platform 14
  • Watergardens departing at 11:28pm & 11:41pm & 11:55pm, Platform 14
  • Sunbury departing at 11:16pm & 11:41pm, Platform 14
  • Upfield departing at 11:19pm & 11:38pm, Platform 14

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Regional train

Normal timetable trains and consists will operate.

Forward service to Southern Cross Station

Additional services

  • Wyndham Vale (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving 3:05pm
  • Wyndham Vale (Geelong) to Southern Cross leaving 3:30pm
  • Melton (Ballarat) to Southern Cross to leaving 4:20pm

Return service from Southern Cross Station

Additional services

  • Southern Cross to Wendouree (Ballarat) leaving 11:25pm
  • Southern Cross to Bacchus Marsh leaving 11:35pm
  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving 11:40pm
  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving 11:45pm

Special event coach service departs Southern Cross at 11.30pm, stopping as required to Seymour Station.

Additional capacity

  • Southern Cross to Waurn Ponds (Geelong) leaving 11:30pm & 12:15am with additional seating
  • Southern Cross to Wendouree (Ballarat) leaving 11:52pm with additional seating
  • Southern Cross to Bendigo (Bendigo) leaving 11:57pm with additional seating

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from Marvel Stadium

Extra trams will operate as Route 30a & 86a between East Melbourne and Stop D1 Etihad Stadium via La Trobe Street.

 Metropolitan bus

Passengers can catch the following bus routes close to Marvel Stadium:

  • Route 235 (Fishermans Bend to City)
